titles.title: To accept the request of the Prairie Island Indian Community to revoke their charter of incorporation issued under the Indian Reorganization Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Native American and Insular Affairs.
Subcommittee on Native American and Insular Affairs Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 104-584.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 288.

action.text: Mr. Hastings (WA) asked unanimous consent to discharge the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and consider.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator McCain with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 104-361.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 573.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Saxton moved that the House suspend the rules and agree to the Senate amendment.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion that the House suspend the rules and agree to the Senate amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/19/1996--Passed Senate amended. Accepts the request of the Prairie Island Indian Community to revoke its charter of incorporation issued under the Indian Recognition Act. Revokes such charter. Amends the Jicarilla Apache Tribe Water Rights Settlement Act to extend the deadline for completion of all requirements necessary to effect such Act to December 31, 1998. Amends the San Carlos Apache Tribe Water Rights Settlement Act of 1992 to extend the deadline for completion of all requirements necessary to effect such Act to June 30, 1997.
